attributes.action: Pot Hole damage compensation minimum amount per wheel due to bad road up keep.
attributes.additional_details: Customers on record repairs carried out on damaged wheels along with enquiries.
attributes.background: We are a Alloy wheel repair company and deal with this on a daily basis where people can not afford to be repeatedly charged for repairs as the roads are in such a state. These people don’t even know how to claim and if they do there is no law on there side to even get a set minimum amount to help.

rejection.details:
Petitions have to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition clearly setting out what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do. Alternatively you might want to sign this petition on a similar subject:
